title: I need 7RP for a skin
body: Can i please get 7Rp for a blitzcrank skin

replies.body:
Hey there,

I hear that the overlords on the Player Support team sometimes like to provide gifts of RP to us underlings in exchange for some artwork, perhaps you should [send them](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) a drawing of blitzcrank along with your request for 7 RP.
